Subject: Re: Peace by Predacons?

From: KSLawdogg@...

Injector/Scattershot/Bumblebee/Shockwave/Breakdown/Hiss/Pyro/Double 
Punch/Manterror/Punch/Nemesis Enforcer:



Injector and Bumblebee simultaneously took careful aim at Prowl and Iron 
Raptor.

---

"Like, dude, like, I want, like, kill!  Not, like, help you, like decorate!  
I--"

The Predacon stopped talking as he heard a loud whisting sound, two missiles 
passing by him, exploding against Injector and Bumblebee's chests, sending 
them both crashing to the ground.

Scattershot gulped.  "I've decided to come help!" he yelled, transforming 
into his bald eagle mode, heading for the Alliance base, boosters engaged.

---

Pyro cursed loudly, feeling something land on his cannon and go into the 
forest, the fires he started not fanning far enough out to stop them.  And 
the heavy weight of the two Maximals had been on his cannon.  Luckily, it 
wasn't a long, somewhat thin cannon.  It was short and big.  If it had been 
any other way, it may have bent or got stuck.  

Twirling his black cannon, he fired off three fireballs a few feet to the 
left of the direction of Dinobot, the shots hitting a tree.  Driving forward, 
he slammed into a tree, knocking it down.  

"I'LL KILL YOU!" he screamed, sending a wave of flames out to the side of 
him, lighting up several trees.

---

Punch, Breakdown, and Hiss ran through the forest, seeing a scaly tail 
disappear into trees, Breakdown firing a grenade at where the tail had been, 
the Predacons fanning out.


---

Shockwave transformed to robot mode, landing on the ground, looking around.  
Seeing a green Predacon heading after the two Maximals that had been 
retreating.  Raising the laser weapon that took the place of his left hand, 
he fired off two shots, each digging precisely into the back of Manterror's 
left knee, sending him crashing down to the ground.

---

Double Punch leapt over Manterror, entering the forest, running as fast as he 
could, getting a reading of where Dinobot was, not going to where he was 
though.  He would cut them off, and try and chase them back to the Alliance 
members.

---

The CR chamber slid open, Nemesis Enforcer stepping out, stretching slightly. 
 "Bon of a slag!" 

He activated his comm. unit on his wrist, speaking into it louldy.  
"REQUESTING ORDERS, SIR!!!"
